descriptionHTML:
Enkelt & Fengende Ordspill
Ordmester tilbyr det klassiske gameplayet til et ordspill på en ny og morsom måte. Du kan enkelt dra bokstaver for å sette sammen forskjellige ord. Det er enkelt å spille og gøy å mestre. Du vil helt sikkert bli hektet på ordsøk-moroa i dette ordspillet.

Mer Enn 2.000 Nivåer
Start med enkle og dagligdagse ord. Vårt ordspill leverer tusenvis av ordutfordringer på forskjellige nivåer som du kan spille. Mange flere nye nivåer vil bli lagt til i fremtiden.

Utfordrende Å Finne Alle Ordene
Holder det ikke å finne ord på de enkle nivåene? Prøv å utfordre deg selv til å finne alle de ekstra vanskelige ordene for en bonus. Setter du deg fast på visse ord, kan du bruke "Omstokk" eller "Hint" for å komme videre. Det kan overraske deg stort hvor enkelt et ord du ikke finner kan vise seg å være.

Beste Hjerneøvelser
Ordspill er best for trening av hjernen og staveferdigheter. Vårt ordspill er et av de mest spennende ordblandings- & ordsøkespill for å utfordre ordsøk-ferdigheter for alle aldre.


FUNKSJONER
- Dra bokstavene for å sette sammen ord
- Finn Ekstra ord for å samle mynter
- 2000+ NIVÅER som du kan spille
- GRATIS å få Daglig Bonus-mynter
- Trykk på "Omstokk"-knappen for å endre rekkefølgen til bokstavene
- Trykk på "Hint"-knappen for å få ledetråder
- Passer for både barn og voksne som vil forbedre sine ordsøkeferdigheter
- Nettverk er ikke påkrevd, og du kan nyte ordsøk når som helst
- Simpelt & Lett å spille, vanskelig å overvinne gameplay
- Fullstendig GRATIS for alle spillere

Hvis du liker kryssord eller ordsøkespill, bør du definitivt prøve dette ordspillet. Det er enklere å komme i gang med enn kryssord, og mye mer fengende.


KONTAKT
support@wordtailorgames.freshdesk.com

comments: The game is simply awesome in a word. The mesmerizing music combined with excellent commentary makes me nostalgic to the time when FT first released Score World Goals. Playing the game is a very smooth experience, in addition to the pleasure from the quality of the graphics. There are some minor problems in gameplay, but these don't matter that much as the game excels with the idea, execution and result. And of course, it is a game where losing creates no frustration. Thanks to FT for providing us this masterpiece.

Love the reduced tackling. It feels more like a high pressing Premier league match now and actually gives you a chance to stop the better teams. With the slower tackling, one missed time tackle deep in your opponents half can result in  them getting the ball all the way to your penalty box and scoring. All the while your players just hover around doing nothing. Keep the reduced tackle time!

I do not like the new update where tackling recharge has been reduced. I think what it was on before was a lot better and made the game a lot more strategic as you had to time your tackles perfectly. I think reduced recharge should be something you can win in the boxes or buy with the money or gems. Another good idea could be to give the team that's just scored 20 seconds of quicker tackling on the back of the goal they have just scored. Please put it back to the normal tackling rate! I am addicted 😂😁

Honestly so angry, you go on a small losing streak and end up not being able to play a game due to not having enough nomey, so I spend £10 of in app purchases thinking it will sort me out, lose once and again I can't afford to play. Don't download money snatching pile of tosh

Pathetic gameplay, it has so many issues that haven't been solved with the updates. First the game lags so much, then you cant even string 2 passes together when the opponent team tackles you off the ball. Ths happens in all difficulties. Can't attack, can't defend. Player updates cost too much. Fix all of this in the next update.

The fast rechargeable tackles should be removed.  The game is no fun now. Earlier I had to time my tackle perfectly so that I don't give away second balls. And same with the attack. I tried to get tackled in an area where I can win second ball. But now this fast tackle recharge has just ruined the game.

comments: The controls are more difficult than the last time I played this game, which was a year or so ago. The new customization is very cool 👌 but the fact that even the joystick (my usual preference) doesn't make it better at controlling. I don't know whether it is because of my phone or if it is in the app. Nevertheless good job, game is very addictive, keep up the good work 👌

this game is a thousand times better than agar.io in my opinion! It's so much easier to get onto the leader board. Every time I play I get onto the leader board. It's just so addicting and I can't get enough. Everyone in my family loves it too. Creating your own skin is a great option as well. My only complaint is that the 'play online' option is very laggy, and if you fix it would be much appreciated. Thanks for a great game, from sinéad, ella, lauren, mollie, shane and ollie 😊😊

This is better than the browser version for multiple reasons. 1) It doesn't lag as much. I played a few rounds a noticed a little bit of lag, but it's better than the browser version.  2) You can play against AI if you don't want to play against people. I like this because I actually had a chance to win and was able to kill some. 3) You can create your own custom skin, which is awesome. All of this is free as well. I love this version of Slither.io.

So I think just about everyone has heard of this game... Buuuuuuut there are some newbies here so I'll explain. Its a multiplayer game and It's in my opinion that It is probibly #2 best game I've ever played. Great concept and I like to get creative on makeing a snake/worm thing. A+ grade. 👌👍

Playing this game is total fun. But It would be more Awesome if there will be some sounds & a pause button maybe. One more thing, somebody tell me how to BOOST the Slither because everyone is boosting except me😭😌😶🙄😓😑😫🙃

The controlls are pretty bad considering how simple they are.  The lag is unbearable. Fix those and you've got a 5star game all day. Simple fun pick up and put down time killer. In fact the lag is such an issue however, the game is getting uninstalled. You can't play a reaction based game when the lag has you 6 seconds behind whats going on.

comments: Great potential, but there needs to be a way to earn free gems for the abundance of chest I have... Also there needs to be time to clean up the map once The main objective is completed and definently more chalice for chances to complete levels, I only have a certain amount of time to play so I need to fit it into my time, not yours.... Ok game but not a great game for the players, micro-transaction heavy and very little chances to complete the levels.

Really enjoy the game. Relaxing and addicting. However, i dont like the large amounts of lock chests taking up my camp space. I think the lock chests are too much of a push to get me to buy crystals. Chances of getting crystals seem slim and with the small amount of space available for other things, this is a down side for me. If i have to pay to open chests that i have been rewarded, why play? That might be  something that causes me to quit the game before too long.

When I first downloaded this game it was fun...now, all the dragons only have a stamina of 1 and now you need trophies to play levels. These trophies take f-o-r-e-v-e-r to accumulate. These things have made the game drag on way too long. And accomplishing any thing may also cost actual money now. I have read other reviews about the money system of this game and I will not be throwing my money down this drain.

Loved this game at the start. But since last update it has crashed on me several times. Today alone it has crashed on me 3 times. I lost all my camp progress each time and had to start again and of course each time is different because it is impossible to duplicate. Today I also lost my dragon gems and dragons I had created prior to crashes. There fore I lost my money spent. I also lost my daily chest which  contained 2 life trees and a super egg fragment.  I am very upset and dissatisfied now and regret spending money on this game that I loved prior to all the crashes.

Please remove The Challenges. The timer runs out too early on all of the challenges, all the way up to challenge 20. I have all the standard levels finished. I have been waiting for you to make new standard levels. The timer is cheating people in your challenges. There is no way they can be completed. I am not buying 50 gems to add 2 minutes. That's a waste of my money.

The game is great but customer service is non- existent. I bought the 30 day gem special that was supposed to come with an egg and fountain. Got the gems (so far)but not the extra items. Tried contacting customer support several times but following their M.O., they never respond.

descriptionHTML:
Discover dragon legends, magic, quests, and a secret land of entertainment and mystery in the world of Merge Dragons! where you can combine everything into better and better things by matching!

In a mystical world hidden among the clouds, the vale of Dragonia flourished. Then evil Zomblins cast a void across the vale. The only hope to heal the land rests in YOUR magical power to MATCH ANYTHING -- dragon eggs, trees, treasures, stars, magical flowers, and even mythical creatures.

Match eggs to hatch helpful dragons, then evolve them to discover more powerful dragons! Figure out challenging puzzle levels: match the Gaia statues to win, then bring rewards back to your Camp to collect and grow.

What will you discover as you match your camp to perfection and nurture your dragons?

MERGE DRAGONS! FEATURES:

== Match Objects ==
• Discover over 500 fantastic objects to match and interact with.
• Freely drag objects around the beautiful world and match 3 of a kind evolve them into better things!
• Match nearly anything - plants, buildings, coins, treasures, fallen stars, magic objects, mythical creatures, and more!
• Match Life Essence and tap it to unleash power to heal the vale!
• Discover the Gaia statues stuck in each level’s cursed land. Match them to solve the puzzle and create life!

== Collect New Dragon Breeds ==
• Discover 17 dragon breeds who live in the vale, and evolve them through 8 growth stages for new dragons!
• Match eggs to hatch helpful dragons who will roam the vale and harvest objects for you to use or match.

== Tricky Puzzles ==
• Over 600 quests to challenge your mind!
• Test your puzzle solving skills in more than 140 tricky levels filled with new quests and rewards to help you build your dragon camp!
• Discover hidden levels - can you find them all?
• On your puzzle journey, you may cross paths with evil Zomblins. Watch out and be careful!

Download now and discover where Merge Dragons! will take you!

Merge Dragons! is brought to you by Gram Games, the studio behind the top hit titles 1010!, Merged!, Six!, Bounzy!, Merge Town!, Merge Farm!, and Paint Tower!

Optimized for Tablets. No Internet connection required.

descriptionHTML:
Magic Tiles ™

Magic Tiles 3 is one of the most popular piano games that has more than 51 million players around the world.

In 2017, we have added the new daily quest system in game helping you get more diamonds and unlock more piano songs. Further, the game is also added new package which includes all new and great songs. Additionally, the battle mode is also improved with extra challenges. Furthermore, new treasure hunt system will provide you a whole new experience and valuable gifts.

Thus, this is a special version with various genres of piano games combining diverse instruments such as guitar, drum, and especially piano! Magic Tiles 3 is one of the most popular new games 2017 which provides user the high-quality piano songs and beautiful gameplay.

Let’s play Magic Tiles 3 on your mobile - One of the best free new games!

Game’s rules:

It’s similar to other piano games, you just have to tap the black tiles and avoid the white tiles then enjoy the wonderful music in game.

Game features:
- Band mode where you can play with more instruments such as guitar, piano, and others.
- Battle mode creates the opportunity for players to compete with others around the world which leads Magic Tiles 3 become such a unique piano online.
- Especially, the advanced feature of battle mode – custom match - which let you to compete directly with your friends and whoever you want to.

- The challenge mode which leads users to improve their tapping speed in order to rank on the top of the world.
- Treasure hunt is where you can open the boxes and received your valuable gifts.
Log in to your Facebook account and share data on multiple devices

So, get ready and try out the piano games for free! The attractive piano online which is more challenging than you could imagine.

comments: This game is amazing.  I play several of the spin/build games, but nothing is like this one.  There is so much things that you can do.  I now have my mom, brother, sister, aunt and cousin playing and still bugging other friends and family to play.  Thanks for a great game. LOVE IT

Something has happened.. I am currently playing the attack master event. I have attacked 20 times at least. But the metre only indicates 6 attacks. Everytime I attack I see hammers going to the metre but the number there remains the same. I would have gotten 12 million and evemln more but due to this issue I haven't. It's definitely the fault of game. Please fix it as soon as possible.

Very frustrating to have to work for weeks to earn enough to build in the higher levels and have it constantly being destroyed because in three days worth of spins you only receive 2 shields... not to mention the rarity of free spins (maybe once a week) Game is an exercise in frustration and not worth the download.

I am playing this game in a long time. but i have found some issue.. many time i am not get shield & someone attacked my village. How to upgrade my village. Pls tell me Moon active team & also upgrade spin 50 to 60 & also redused village manufacturar cost... Thank You.

Game was running successfully but now game has stopped working in my phone all of a sudden, I have uninstalled the game and again installed but not working. My mobile handset is Motorola g5 plus and android version 7. Please help me out to resolve the issue asap.

I actually liked this game but recently very glitchy/buggy. I get attacked by the same person twice within less than a min of each, same with raids. I earn for attack/raid master and the counter doesn't update. Freezes in the middle of spins. Don't earn coins for watching videos sometimes. This is even after the most recent update

descriptionHTML:
Join your Facebook friends and millions of players around the world in attacks, spins and raids to build your viking village to the top!

Do you have what it takes to be the next Coin Master? Can you travel through time and magical lands to battle it out to be the best Pirate, Hippie, King, Warrior or VIKING of them of all!

Spin to earn your loot
Spin the wheel to fall on your fortune, be it attack time, loot, shields or raids. Win your loot by landing on coins or gold sacks so you can build strong villages through the game and move up in levels. Win shields to guard your village from other vikings trying to attack you. Become the Coin Master with the strongest village and the most loot!

Attack and Raid fellow vikings!
Earning coins through the slot machine isn't the only way to get loot, you can steal it too! Attack or raid friend and foe to save enough loot to build your village. No need to break the piggy bank! Fight back and come out victorious against your enemies. Boom! Take revenge on those who have attacked your village and take whats rightfully yours! Bring your Coin Dozer and get rich again! You never know what treasures you can find in someone else's village!

Collect all the Cards!
It's not always about the loot, it's about the treasure too! Collect cards to complete sets and move on to the next village. With every village you conquer your wins will be greater

Play with friends!
Trade your cards with our online community to collect them all! Join our fast growing interactive Facebook community to meet new viking friends, earn big rewards, and trade treasures!

★ Battle your way to be the next Coin Master with your friends by your side.
★ Join in millions of players worldwide!

Then you can exchange your earned points for PYPAL/PYATM/Gift Cards and there're various options to choose from. Also 'VADZ' App is perfect for anyone in anywhere who has free time and doesn't wana waste it, you can use it while working,traveling.. simply earning by watching advertisements!

good way to teach us to be patient should we prefer to play freely.   Occasionally error.  KING, to make this game more enjoyable, .wld you pls kindly give us PIGGY BANK freely so we can still collect and use our gold? .pls give brief explanation on new things we're abt to encounter, e.g: HOW TO PLAY, the use of NEW THINGS.  thanks KING, jia you

I just completed all 3185 rounds... took nearly 2 years to do so. A couple of suggestions...  1. Some big reward must be given to the one who completes all the rounds... an uphill task. 2. All these years I played the spin wheel every day ... but not even once the jackpot was opened... it simply shows the malintentions of the programmers who programmed it as such. 3. Boosters must be given more often.

Bright, colorful, addictive game play. Adorably happy graphics. Love "Mr. Encouragement", who exclaims "sweet!", & "delicious!" in his baritone voice. The music isn't my favorite, I find it somewhat creepy. Greatful for the music mute button.  Thank you Development Crew for a fantastic, free app which I have been playing for years! One suggestion: make it clear $3 gets you one-time access to your piggy bank only. Thanks😄

I love this game but level 3166 is impossible! Once you take out one licorice another drops....you need to rethink that level, because it's a level that will make people stop playing.... doesn't matter what boosters you use the licorice keeps dropping and you can NEVER clear all the jelly!

Played over 3100 levels and one thing that keeps happening to me is that my power ups keep disappearing! Over and over and over again. And one more thing, Can you explain why I have to wait over 2800 minutes for my next life? It's been 3 days and it went from 2800 minutes to 2300 minutes! Based on your stupid calculations each day is equal to 170 minutes? Give me your supports group email add and I will send you a screenshot!

comments: I like it.   The fish are friendly and encouraging.  I use the game to help me keep calm and relax.  Please consider allowing us to select another of one of the earlier aquariums when we get to the point where we are waiting for new aquariums to be developed and have finished everything.  I'd like a place to put new fish and decorations, but none of the old fish want to be sold.  They are still my favorite friends.  The game uses a lot of memory, and I had to uninstall it from my tablet because it kept making it crash.  Works on my phone, but it's still a lot of memory.

Love this game!! I love the challenge with completing levels. There's days I can't get enough of this game. I play every day. I love decorating my tanks. I love when I get infinite time, but It would be nice if we had control over when to use it or the time would stop and be saved for when we return. Sometimes 6 hours is impossible to sit there and just play. One thing that would be nice is if we didn't have to wait 30 mins for a life to renew and could have more friends to  receive more lives and got to use the diamonds we earned amd not be stored in a bank to buy. Other than that I cant complain😉 best game out there and I highly recommend it to all ages.

It's a great game. I play it with my daughter on our freetime it's quite addictive. Its great that you get rewards if you have to watch the movies. The only thing i would change is the reloding of the lives. Half an hour for one life is too long. Every so often you get a few free hours, but you need to have free time to play.I love the fact that we can play using my phone sideways (landscape ) as I have a problem with my wrist. I highly recommend it!

Fishdom is a fun game.  The puzzles are challenging. I would love to see a change to the gifts we can give our neighbors . Such as, the lightening, or fireworks, or an ornament for their aquarium. I would also like to see the diamonds we earn to be available, not stuck in a bank, to be paid for.  Limits could be put on it, of course, but the free one here and there only help once in any puzzle sequence.   Overall, though, its a nice game.

I love this game I just wish it was more interactive with the fish in one's tank. Like when you pet them little hearts appear and one can earn happiness points with so many touches. I also wish that one could still earn something for previous tanks. I have no real reason to visit my first and second tank. I don't earn anything for more decorations and it doesn't get dirty and the fish don't get hungry. I feel bad for them, but I focus on my current tanks.

Got a new tablet for Xmas.   Had game on sd card. Wouldn't transfer to new tablet.  Was on level 105.  Have to start all over again! TORTURE lol. Other games I would just stop but not this one.  I love It!  EDIT...STILL LOVE THIS GAME.  Highly reccommend it!  Some levels are SO difficult but still loving this game Oct 9/17.  DEC 2017.  Still adore this game.  Now my husband plays too.  Best game EVER!
description: Never Fishdomed before? Take a deep breath and dive into an underwater world of match-3 fun with Fishdom, an all-new free game! Try challenging and fun match-3 gameplay with unique puzzles as you decorate aquariums to create cozy homes for lovely talking fish. Feed them, play with them, and watch them interact with each other. Hey, your finned friends are waiting for you, so dive in now and enjoy this amazing underwater adventure! Features:● Unique gameplay: swap and match pieces, design and decorate aquariums, play with and take care of fish—all in one puzzle game!● Play hundreds of challenging and fun match-3 levels● Compete with other players to develop your aquarium even faster● Explore an exciting aquatic world with funny talking 3D fish that each have their own personality● Liven up fish tanks with breathtaking underwater decor● Grab your scuba mask and enjoy amazing aquarium graphics● It’s a blast for everyone: share your Fishdom mania with your Facebook friends!● No Wi-Fi or internet connection required to play Please note that Fishdom is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. Enjoying Fishdom? Learn more: Facebook: facebook.com/Fishdom Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/fishdom_mobile/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/FishdomOfficial Questions? Contact our tech support at fishdom@playrix.com

comments: More ads= more money, less stars= less money so you choose. Anyway the game's good everything is cool but.. if u think u have seen an app with more adds then you know nothing download any voodoo game.. Literally after every single game over u get ads so it doesnt really matter if u tap the revive button (yeah u should u get ads regardless)

Honestly, it's a really good game that mangages to pass as challenging, entertaining, addictive, and time-consuming (in my opintion) all at the same time. But, there are WAY to many ads. The game itself is great but all the ads and interuptions completely takes away from the main purpose of the game; having fun. That's pretty much the only aspect of the game that I highly suggest improving at the moment.

I think the ads are fine. It acts as a breather whenever i lost a run. The gameplay is addictive and all. but.... BUGS! i hate it when i pass through 3 or more layers. And still died by stepping on dangerous tile instead of breaking it. Just had a 11k run today and died because of a stupid bug

Honestly i love this game its a great way to kill time. And there's a lot of reviews on here saying how theres too many ads. Heres the simple solution to that. Don't like ads? Turn off your wifi. Ads can't play without internet.
Reformat your ads. If you're gonna have one play after you lose do it exactly when you lose, not after yu've had a chance to start the next wave. Otherwise watching an ad to revive seems really dumb

It's a good game that is challenging to start,  but adds nothing to keep it challenging. It just changes colors. It would be nice to have a timer,  or a high score, or something to aim to beat. Or maybe even that once you hit a section of a tear it falls away and you have to keep moving (challenge mode). I still play it,  I like it. Just wish there was something to keep it challenging.

comments: Its a super fun game and I liked it. But for some reason every 5 seconds an internet browser would pop up saying I had a virus on my phone. Checked my phone but nothing. It never did this with any other app even before downloading this. Only ever happened when playing the game.

I actually like the game, but I got all the guys in 3 days.... Now what? There are no upgrades or any other options to use the money on. Also the same thing is happening as others said, where the browser keeps popping up saying there is a virus. Pretty annoying

Fun game, very entertaining. Ads pop up too often, it opens my browser saying i have a virus. I cant avoid it and it happens very often. Im only keeping the app bc i hope the next update fixes this issue. Other than the stupid pop up its a great game and i enjoy it. Please fix it so i dont have to uninstall.

I wanted to enjoy this game. The advertisements randomly open chrome browser windows with a fake virus scan saying "your device is infected." Its ironic in that the software that you're prompted to download is terrible adware that an actual scanner might flag.  It's quite persistent too, happening only after I installed this. 30 second video ads midgsme and adbars that just so happen to pop up and hover where you have to click in-game.

I love the game as a whole, and I just barely redownloaded it and it saved my progress, but I can't even get through one whole throw without it opening up chrome with a fake survey or whatever. I'm not joking, it's really bad. That's why I can't give this a good rating. I understand the need for ads in a free game, but for whatever reason, mine is nothing but ads.

I did not play this game for a long time. I download it and I only played it for maybe 2 hours. I tried to play, but when I  was in the middle of the game and it froze and sent me back to my home screen. The controls I like. This is not the greatest game I have seen, but It's ok😐😐😞😞

comments: One way to check how much products I have left is by touching the machine and thr corresponding product but sometimes the game will assume  that you are putting the product into production hence it will put the product into production whether you want it or not so it will waste production time. Sometimes the touch is too sensitive. Sometimes the touch is not sensitive enough which forces me to drag the product into the production slot up to 10 ten times just to start production. I know this feedback is not much but maybe an undo button will help. It makes the gameplay million times difference if you  put your players comfort a priority.

They keep taking my diamonds and telling me I spent them somewhere. Like I spent 19 on fast tracking 1 Coco tree while I have Tom for 6 days and 102 Coco's in my silo then tell me they can't refund it because I'm a liar! They took 50 from my husband and only refunded him 30!! Super cell is ripping players off!!

I buy an axe it will last forever same thing with other tools but here I have to keep buying tools to do the job. An if I need more crop I get the land ready for more seeding get the water. This you have to bring in more people that never show up to do the work. That's why if I'm going to farm I count on one person me. Here you need others. It not for me.

Love this game. My mom and I play it 24/7. It's addicting. Annnd it's a great time killer. Just like everyone else there are things that I would suggest to improve the game. Like for example the time frame for waiting on items. Crazyyyy long. Like the fish nets are like 14hrs! Could drop all the high times to half. That would be cool. But of course if you guys did that then it would be super easy to level up. And you guys would loose out on money cause there are some impatience people out there that just go ahead and buy diamonds and such. Anywho. Love the game. Please consider some of these people's suggestions. Thank you. #HayDayFan

Long time player returning to the game after taking a break. I leveled up to level 41 today. Before leveling up it showed I should get 1 white and 1 black rabbit with the new level but I didn't get either of them. I would also like to see it a bit easier to get wildlife refuge animals. 36 puzzle pieces seems a bit much.

Good game. I initially wrote a one star review because this game was very dependant on microtransactions but it's actually pretty fun if you have the patience. Right off the bat you have to wait upwards to 30 minutes or an hour for basic production and warming but as you grow your farm it gets easier to deal with. This definitely isn't a game you can play for, like, an hour, consecutively, which kinda sucks but it's great for the 10-20 minites you pop in now and then.
description: Best. Farm. Ever. Welcome to Hay Day, the most popular farming game on mobiles and tablets, number one in 122 countries.Learn the lay of the land, tend to your crops, and trade goods with neighbors and friends. It’s a real special place where the crops never die even though it never rains. Sharing the farm with our quirky animals only makes things more fun!PLEASE NOTE! Hay Day is free to download and install. However, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. A network connection is also required.~~~~~~~~~~FEATURES~~~~~~~~~~♥ Grow and customize your farm♥ Trade crops and fresh goods with neighbors and friends through your very own roadside shop♥ Fulfill orders with your truck and even by steamboat♥ Repair your dock and cast your lure to fish the waters♥ Build your own town and welcome visitors~~~~~~~~~~~MEDIA MENTIONS~~~~~~~~~~~Hay Day‘s presentation is fairly cinematic for a mobile game. It’s eye candy. [...] If you’re a fan of simulation games, Hay Day is visually pleasing and will definitely keep your inner agriculturalist giddy for hourshttp://www.gamezebo.com/2012/07/03/hay-day-review/Watching your crops grow and your twee factories spew out products is a quietly pleasing experience.http://www.pocketgamer.co.uk/r/Multiformat/Hay+Day/review.asp?c=42764~~~~~~~~~~~PLAYER REVIEWS~~~~~~~~~~~Hay Day is very proud to announce over 5 million five star reviews on Google Play! ~~~~~~~~~~SUPPORT~~~~~~~~~~Neighbor, are you having problems? Visit https://supercell.helpshift.com/a/hay-day/?l=en or contact us in game by going to Settings > Help and Support.Under our Terms of Services and Privacy Policy, Hay Day is allowed for download and play only for persons 13 years or over of age.Privacy Policy:http://www.supercell.net/privacy-policy/Terms of Service:http://www.supercell.net/terms-of-service/Parent's Guide:http://www.supercell.net/parents/

Learn the lay of the land, tend to your crops, and trade goods with neighbors and friends. It’s a real special place where the crops never die even though it never rains. Sharing the farm with our quirky animals only makes things more fun!

PLEASE NOTE! Hay Day is free to download and install. However, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. A network connection is also required.

~~~~~~~~~~
FEATURES

comments: Great fun game. Only reason I didn't give it a 5 is because you go through your money pretty quick buying boosts to win levels to then upgrade your garden. I like the game a lot. Also I think that at the end of your board if you have undetonated items they should detonate at the end of that level. I've lost too many levels because of not getting one item that was next to something that was undetonated.

I Love Gardenscapes and It Is Fun Way to Be Creative.  A Recent Update has Made it Definitely Better.  The Support Team Has Been Exceptional With Quick Responses and Answers!  There is Room for Improvement in the Amount of Coins Obtained in Completing Tasks, as Well as Eliminating Repetitious Tasks Requiring More Moves.

I love home scape but it can be quite spendy. Both games are fun.  Love graphics animation laughter now free gifts.  Gardens cape is even more fun doesn't get boring like home scape when pay to win is obvious.  Gardens scape takes 1 or 2 coins with easier quests.   Still favorite.  Home scapes got greedy please return again where its not pay to win.  At times we need a color no bonus and lose because home scape didn't offer the color.  Spending hundreds on home scape so thinking of my budget and returning to garden scape.  Gardens cape started it all. Please lower prices

Either make the puzzles easier or give more Passes to actually be able to pass the level ....make it easier to get to other rooms, too many attention to details..also so many tokens should be able to buy a few stars... I've been on the same room level since I started playing and way past level 100. Starting to get bored at this point.

Much has improved since my original review (see below). There are special events going on quite often to help with earning coins and powerups, and the levels don't seem to be as tedious. Keep it up, guys!   "I love this game but the levels are often too hard to beat without power-up help, and it takes so long to earn coins. Most of my friends have quit playing"

The reward for finishing a puzzle is around 50 to 60 coins. It cost 900 coins for 5 extra turns, and 1200 for the next. It has taken me up to 3 weeks playing all my lives as much as possible to finish 1 puzzle. This game is designed to frustrate you into spending money so you can complete the puzzles. Which I wouldn't mind if it was rewarded more fairly. Play Monsterbusters, it is by far more fun, you earn better rewards, and you can buy new lives and power-ups with your coins at a much more fair rate.
description: Welcome to Gardenscapes! Rake your way through a storyline full of unexpected twists and turns to restore a wonderful garden to its former glory. Embark on an adventurous journey: beat match-3 levels, restore and decorate different areas in the garden, get to the bottom of the secrets it holds, and enjoy the company of amusing in-game characters, including Austin, your butler, and a funny dog! What are you waiting for? Indulge yourself in some gardening and become the hero of a brand new story. Build your dream garden for free! The game features:● Addictive gameplay: swap and match, restore and decorate the garden, and be part of a breath-taking adventure all at once!● Hundreds of unique match-3 levels● Dozens of in-game characters you can make friends with● An adorable puppy who is always there to cheer you up● An in-game social network you can use to keep tabs on everything● Different areas in the garden, each with unique structures: broken fountains, mysterious mazes, an old mansion, and much more● A community that comes first — be neighbors with your Facebook friends!● A super addicting game you can even play offline! Gardenscapes is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. Enjoying Gardenscapes? Learn more about the game!Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GardenscapesInstagram: https://www.instagram.com/gardenscapes_mobile/Twitter: https://twitter.com/garden_scapes Questions? Contact our tech support at gardenscapes@playrix.com

descriptionHTML:
Scale is a free and an addictive arcade game with an unique gameplay containing slicer and balls.

Truly a brain teaser and Its super fun!


How to play?


Its easy, all you have to do is to cut and shrink the board by placing the slicers.

You need to be strategic to scale the board wisely and watch out for the ball!

If you touch the balls before your cut is complete, you lose a life.


Increase your score, get diamonds, check the leaderboard and compete your friends.

Try this fun game now!

Best arcade game ever, how far can you go?

description: Ordsjarme er et av de mest engasjerende ordspillene, med flott grafikk og interaksjonsdesign. Den beste måten å slå ihjel tid på, lett å spille, gir god hjernetrim og lærer deg flere nye ord. Ta en pause fra arbeidet og frisk opp hjernen med Ordsjarme! Du vil elske det! Nytt spill for lek med ordGanske enkelt sveip bokstaver for å lage ord, enkelt å lære og gøy å spille. Du kan blande bokstavene for å endre rekkefølgen. Jo flere ord du finner, jo flere mynter vil du tjene. Disse kan du bruke på senere nivåer for å få et hint når du står fast. 2000+ nivåer å spilleMer enn 2000 nivåer med stigende vanskelighetsgrad. Du vil se at det er utfordrende, men likevel interessant nok til å ville fortsette. Vi oppdaterer nivåene fra tid til annen for å gi deg løpende overraskelser. Vellaget grensesnitt med flott grafikkVårt grensesnitt er intuitivt og lett å fatte. Vi tilbyr mange bokstavtyper og bakgrunner å velge mellom slik at du aldri går trøtt. De vil jevnlig bli oppdatert slik at du alltid har noe å se frem til. Beste måten å slappe av med hjernetrimOrdsjarme trimmer hjernen og bedrer hukommelsen når du må gjøre ditt beste for å finne mange ord med gitte bokstaver. Av og til er svaret innlysende, men du kommer likevel ikke på ordet og nettopp det er noe av det som gjør spillet mest interessant.  Egenskaper•  Super grafikk og flott grensesnitt.•  Nytt spill for lek med ord: Bare koble bokstavene for å lage ord.•  2000+ nivåer for å spille med økende utfordringer.•  10+ flotte tema å velge fra.•  Daglige utfordringer gir bonus og mer moro.•  Finn så mange ord du kan og få mer bonus for ekstra ord.•  Trykk på "Omstokk"-knappen for å endre rekkefølgen til bokstavene•  Trykk på "Hint"-knappen for å få ledetråder•  Du kan spille hvor som helst og når som helst med eller uten nettverk.•  Helt gratis for alle.•  Også perfekt som staveøvelser for barn.   KontaktTa gjerne kontakt, og tilbakemeldinger til  support@wordgame.freshdesk.com ønskes velkommen. Takk for støtte og kjærlighet til Ordsjarme.
descriptionHTML:
Ordsjarme er et av de mest engasjerende ordspillene, med flott grafikk og interaksjonsdesign. Den beste måten å slå ihjel tid på, lett å spille, gir god hjernetrim og lærer deg flere nye ord. Ta en pause fra arbeidet og frisk opp hjernen med Ordsjarme! Du vil elske det!

Nytt spill for lek med ord
Ganske enkelt sveip bokstaver for å lage ord, enkelt å lære og gøy å spille. Du kan blande bokstavene for å endre rekkefølgen. Jo flere ord du finner, jo flere mynter vil du tjene. Disse kan du bruke på senere nivåer for å få et hint når du står fast.

2000+ nivåer å spille
Mer enn 2000 nivåer med stigende vanskelighetsgrad. Du vil se at det er utfordrende, men likevel interessant nok til å ville fortsette. Vi oppdaterer nivåene fra tid til annen for å gi deg løpende overraskelser.

Vellaget grensesnitt med flott grafikk
Vårt grensesnitt er intuitivt og lett å fatte. Vi tilbyr mange bokstavtyper og bakgrunner å velge mellom slik at du aldri går trøtt. De vil jevnlig bli oppdatert slik at du alltid har noe å se frem til.

Beste måten å slappe av med hjernetrim
Ordsjarme trimmer hjernen og bedrer hukommelsen når du må gjøre ditt beste for å finne mange ord med gitte bokstaver. Av og til er svaret innlysende, men du kommer likevel ikke på ordet og nettopp det er noe av det som gjør spillet mest interessant.


Egenskaper
• Super grafikk og flott grensesnitt.
• Nytt spill for lek med ord: Bare koble bokstavene for å lage ord.
• 2000+ nivåer for å spille med økende utfordringer.
• 10+ flotte tema å velge fra.
• Daglige utfordringer gir bonus og mer moro.
• Finn så mange ord du kan og få mer bonus for ekstra ord.
• Trykk på "Omstokk"-knappen for å endre rekkefølgen til bokstavene
• Trykk på "Hint"-knappen for å få ledetråder
• Du kan spille hvor som helst og når som helst med eller uten nettverk.
• Helt gratis for alle.
• Også perfekt som staveøvelser for barn.


Kontakt
Ta gjerne kontakt, og tilbakemeldinger til support@wordgame.freshdesk.com ønskes velkommen.

Takk for støtte og kjærlighet til Ordsjarme.
developerAddress: Lockhart Ctr., 301-307 Lockhart Rd., Wan Chai, Hong Kong

descriptionHTML:
Catboy, Gekko and Owlette are back in this brand new PJ Masks game app.

Choose your favourite hero character to play with and journey across the moonlit rooftops, and through the night, collecting as many orbs as you can. But beware of those pesky villains, they’re up to mischief again!

FEATURES

Collectable orbs
The hero characters will be able to collect orbs to add to their final score.

Gold Amulets
Each character is able to pick up gold amulets along the way to boost their final score. Make sure to keep your eyes out for them as they’re harder to find!

Character Power-ups
Collect the coloured amulets and trigger the heroes’ super powers:
Catboy – ability to jump higher
Owlette – ability to see hidden orbs
Gekko – ability to smash through obstacles

Hazards
Help the heroes dodgy the obstacles the villains are throwing in their way!

The PJ Masks are on their way, into the night to save the day!

No adverts, no in-app purchases, just lots of action and fun!

Please note: This app is not compatible with some older Android devices

comments: Oh my gosh. This game is one of the best. It literally like a normal school. You jave schedules. You can do ballet class, hip hop class, latina class and finally jazz class. You can go to diffrent places to get outfit,makeup and hair done. They actually give you a report card with all your classsess and grade. You can peform in front of an audience and you can battle people at the battle arena. Finally my favorite part of this game BOY DRAMA AND GIRL DRAMA it's amazing. DOWNLOAD THIS GAME RIGHT NOW!!!!!!!!!

I love the quality of the game. Great time killer.Brings out my inner Ballerina lol. Easy, Fun.Game The only thing so far i dont like is wadrobe. For example If your swiching btwn classess its hard to complety take off i.e jacket, tights or pants from previous classes. If u pick certain outfits there stuck on you. Please fix. Other then that good game.

I'm not much of a dance gamer but I love simulation games. This one in particular is very innovative with their design and gameplay. I was skeptical of how I was going to like it at first but it proved me wrong and I immediately took to it. The controls are easy to learn and I don't even mind all of the ads. Honestly, a really great game.

I love this game! It is really fun and if you like dancing then this is the one for you! Personally I like gymnastics more but that's because I've come a long way in it. The only thing that you could change is the amount of ads are! There are so many of them! But over all this game is great! 😉😉

Honestly, one of the best games that I ever played. Dont care much for the ads. Just turn off your data and none of the ads will come out😉 But just like what the other reviewers are saying, the option to choose and take off certain clothes are limited. But other than that, great game.

This game is actually good. The biggest downside is that there's A LOT OF ADVERTISEMENT to watch during playing. I know this is a free game, but c'mon! Waiting and watching minutes of the advertisement is longer than playing the game itself. Not to mention the conversation between characters in the game also took too long to wait and there's some things need to use real money before it can be explored.  This kind of game supposed to be fun and gives the cha cha feeling, but instead I get frustrated of waiting for the advertisement to finish before I can continue playing.  Out of all that, this game is great.
description: Ever dreamed of dancing on stage, spotlight on you, crowd going wild? Now’s your moment to step up and compete – you’re a rising star! You've been accepted to step up, compete and just dance in the exclusive Fame Dance School. Enjoy your dance classes! In this dance school simulation game, step up and impress your tough teachers. Will you go for ballet dance or hip hop dance? Either way, you’ve gotta just dance your heart out in the dance studio. Choose your dance classes and master new moves in ballet dance, hip hop dance, jazz and Latin dance. But there’s drama off-stage too…Sam, the hottest guy at dance school, has eyes on you. Sounds perfect, huh? But no - he has a girlfriend, the cold-hearted (but great dancer) Victoria. She’ll compete with you to make your life a living hell, so watch out! Ready for a dance battle? Who will step up and compete to get the lead part and be the ultimate rising star? Just dance in your hip hop dance classes and more and hope for the best. Who will it be?This rising star simulation game is full of cliffhangers that will keep you coming back for more!Features:> Make your own dance school choices in this dance studio simulation game - become a rising star!> Which dance classes do you want to take? descriptionHTML:
Ever dreamed of dancing on stage, spotlight on you, crowd going wild? Now’s your moment to step up and compete – you’re a rising star! You've been accepted to step up, compete and just dance in the exclusive Fame Dance School. Enjoy your dance classes!

In this dance school simulation game, step up and impress your tough teachers. Will you go for ballet dance or hip hop dance? Either way, you’ve gotta just dance your heart out in the dance studio. Choose your dance classes and master new moves in ballet dance, hip hop dance, jazz and Latin dance. But there’s drama off-stage too…Sam, the hottest guy at dance school, has eyes on you. Sounds perfect, huh? But no - he has a girlfriend, the cold-hearted (but great dancer) Victoria. She’ll compete with you to make your life a living hell, so watch out! Ready for a dance battle? Who will step up and compete to get the lead part and be the ultimate rising star? Just dance in your hip hop dance classes and more and hope for the best. Who will it be?
This rising star simulation game is full of cliffhangers that will keep you coming back for more!

Features:
> Make your own dance school choices in this dance studio simulation game - become a rising star!
> Which dance classes do you want to take? Pick from ballet dance, hip hop dance, and more – set your own dance studio schedule
> Advance to the next level of dance classes by completing simulation game tasks and dance battles
> Rock your audition! Just dance and repeat your teacher’s moves
> Being a ballerina is hard work - practice your plies, pirouettes, and ballet dance moves in the dance studio!
> Pick out a killer dance outfit before you compete in your big performance!
> It’s dance battle time – step up and show off your hip hop dance skills in the ultimate dance battle!
> Lift weights, hula hoop, and bike at the gym
> You’ve mastered your jazz technique - show off that fancy footwork in the dance studio!
> Show everyone that you're a versatile dancer – just dance and amaze them with your Latin dance and ballet dance moves.
>> Uh oh, you're caught in a love triangle. It’s a dance battle for the heart… who will you choose?
>> It’s time to perfect your look! Give yourself a makeover with new clothes, makeup, a hairstyle and accessories. You’re a rising star!

comments: I love this game especially play when I have alot on my mind and need a distraction. Outs addictive and they are reasonable with purchasing extra anything. They give daily prizesand makes thou wsnt to come back. It can be frustratingly challenging and that is a hood thing.. thank you creators.

Ok new review, I've passed all 1740 levels would have given 5 stars but the upper levels can only be passed when you hit the right program! Play same level 20-30+ times then suddenly pass with 10-15 moves left!!! Not fun anymore!!! Uninstalled
This game was my favorite, however the lack of being able to reset the game is truly sad 😢 and takes away from my joy of the game! Please give the option for us to reset our play easily, please 💕
Can you sponsor a video for me? I've introduced this game to several people and I have yet to hear it be exposed on youtube. As a creator I can give the game the exposure it deserves.

The recent changes to the game bother me, you can no longer see how many points you get as you go or when you fail. Now it seems that they limit the amount of points you can get at the end for the moves you have left. The only time you see points is the total at the very end. Seems like they're screwing the people who want to get 3 stars on the levels...

I enjoyed playing this game but I was to reset game to beginning.Tried clearing data and cache but didn't work.E-mailed developers to ask them and they e-mailed back saying they would but only once which I am still waiting for them to do.What is the big deal about wanting to start over the game again?Better that than once getting to levels you can't do to not play game again surely!!!!

But be careful! It is not that easy to save all the toys while your moves are limited! Your talent in solving puzzles will be your best tool while playing this super addictive game. Bust the blocks and enjoy this colorful adventure! Discover Amy’s world to make her smile. Play with the sweetest toys that will drag you to Amy’s enjoyable world. comments: I don't write reviews on games , but this one is impressive. Once I tweaked the settings the graphics became amazing, love that there is NO wait time for upgrades ! You buy it, you own it . Big advantage.. And you dont HAVE to go platinum to enjoy this game, but I am considering it ! GREAT JOB !!

It has a good game play as well as millions of adds which eventually ruines the game. You have to watch an add after every single mission and before starting a new mission to gain energy. So basically the energy bar is just a little trick played on us for watching advertisement. I will not recommend this game only because of the adds, otherwise it's really a good game.

Do not buy Premium. You see all the locked features saying exclusive to Premium. You drop $70 for Premium only to find out the best features are still locked because now there is Premium Plus for ANOTHER $150. You are not told other than here by me that what you get when you buy Premium is a Premium-lite. You hear about Premium Plus for the first time after you have bought Premium (lite)

I do liken the game. Here are my pros and cons. Great graphics, wide variety of levels, and ease of controls.  Weapons are too expensive, the game stays one step ahead of you as far as when it offers you deals on weapons. You will either not have the points or coins to purchase and then when you do it offers one level too high at your point in the game to purchase.

Nice game. So far I've noticed only critical hits count. Taking out a knee or a shot to the gonads usually fails. Upgrades are like any other game, spend money to get the good stuff. Hopefully it doesn't get to the point I can't unlock the items to keep playing.

Sinse last update when playing when get killed it will show score screen but spawning back to game locks up and won't play just have to watch myself lose or stop and start over losing my life??????? Please fix...... Would like to know when you are going to fix can't win for losing life and diamonds and not even getting to play!!!!!!!!!! Don't know what you have done to the game getting where it is no fun getting killed before you even get respawned

comments: Ads after ever single try, even if you only play for 5 seconds before you die. If you're trying to complete a challenge, every couple tries it will reset to free play mode and you have to go intentionally kill yourself which sometimes takes way too long. Then if you don't tap the challenge button exactly right, you have to free play again. Then every time you get back into the challenge screen, you have to scroll all the way through every one you've completed. The game would be fun if it wasn't so infuriating.

I paid the 2 odd dollars to remove the ads since i really enjoyed the game. If you are thinking about doing the same DON'T. Paying the money removes ZERO ads. It simply allows you to skip most of them after 5 to 10 seconds rather than watching the whole 20 to 30 second ad. They still pop up just as often and are just as annoying. Personally I would wait for another developer to make a good clone of the game, shouldn't take long it's a simple engine.

What I couldn't even get taken to dinner before being forcibly bent over with ads? I mean with in 45 seconds; I downloaded, opened, played 2 games, and BAM! There it is. What, you couldn't even butter a brotha up? Hell I'd even been fine being lathered up with 10 minutes. Soo ok, I bite, i watch the ad. Attempt number 3 is going well l, bam I die. Tap to continue, well there's a 5 second cool down for revive I didn't notice at first. So I think to myself "well that's probably what I watched the ad for." Wait the cool down, tap to continue. So I tapped, and BAM! ANOTHER AD. Hmm welp you wanted a rating and here it is. Give me about 5 minutes of gameplay before two back to back ads and I might consider having the game installed longer.

DO NOT PAY TO GET RID OF ADS!! IT'S A SCAM...IVE PAID AND IT DID NOT WORK. EMAILED THEM TWICE NOW OVER A MONTH. NO RESPONSE AFTER THOSE ATTEMPTS. Great game but deliver to customers when they give you money VOODOO. And a simple email would be nice jeez

If you're a sucker like me then you paid the $2 something to remove the ads. Doesn't work, obviously a scam. Helpful Hint: If you play with data and Wi-Fi off the ads actually disappear regardless of whether you paid to have them gone or not. Although this shouldn't have to be necessary it's the only way you're gonna enjoy this game as there is and ad Every. Single. Time. You. Die.

Paid to have add removed, no add were removed! Reading though the comments it's seems like I'm not the only one who feels this way. Bit of a shame as I wanted to like this game but it makes it impossible to tolerate for more than a couple of goes as the add pop up every time still!!

comments: The game itself is really fun, but it's horribly unoptimized and crashes frequently. 90% of the time when playing I would hit frequent lag spikes that makes the game practically impossible to play. Whenever I try to watch an ad, the game crashes and the random pop up ads have like a 20% chance to crash the game.

The game overall is awesome, though there are some things that need some work.   To give an example I personally find it very annoying when the screen zooms in when you get a combo. Like it is now it's very hard to manouvre around incoming cops as you only have a split second to react. Maybe something like a copcar indicator would be in place as well.  For the rest I find the game great and super fun to play, although I'd hope to see newer, cooler and more expensive cars. The ones that are available right now are quite easy to get and don't need much grinding at all.  All with all it's a great game and I love playing it. Keep on the good work folks!
I would give it more stars, but it glitches a lot.  My car jumps to random places on the screen. If you fix I will give it 5 stars.

I really like the game, but since its single player, for 400 coins (that's what I call the in game currency)could we have a mode where you can create your own vehicle and vehicle stats , (health, speed, etc.) Pls. then I will give a five star rating, keep up the great work.
Game is really fun but crashes all the time. Downloaded after watching a friend who plays on iOS - where it never crashes. This version crashes when you start ads and sometimes just randomly.
Damn cop cars coming out of f, nowhere. Can it give us a warning of where they coming?

comments: Good game. I love the fact you can get premium crystals or gems easily and on a regular basis.  Only thing I don't like is the golden cup shots or whatever they are called. Make an option to use those gems for shots instead of real cash would be nice but still earned 5 stars. Samsung galaxy note 8

I think everything is fantastic about the game, but after this last update. The loading time is 20x slower if it loads at all. Galaxy phone. I can't leave message with development so this is the best I can do about that. But I love the game and this wouldn't change my activity amount at all. Keep up the great work development and look forward to new games in the future.

Best game i played ever. But new update have some bugs like if we going to play with friends it take too much time for loading nd mostly notification pop up that there is an error your coins refunded in your account. Kindly resolve this issue. Except this best game 👍

So I have no idea why I am always at a club disadvantage. My driver is level 5 and always vs a person with level 7 or 8. Why do I never go against level 3 drivers. Always vs higher clubs! ALL THE TIME! you might as well give them the win. Losing me as a customer because there is something very lopsided.

Game sucks donkey *****. You play maybe 10 beginner holes and get chests that open in 12 seconds. THEN you play a normal hole and get a chest that doesn't open for 4hrs. You only get four chest slots so that means you can only win four holes then you have to wait 4hrs (or 8 or 12hrs depending on the chest you choose to open) before you can get anything for winning a hole. In two days, I haven't even played 18 holes. Guess you gotta have money if you wanna play. Thought I trusted the "Editors Choice" games, guess not.

Love the game, but its not perfect. You could make the textures better and add more detail in each level bc right now they look empty. Also matchmaking is garbadge, and I get matched against people with much higher trophy counts and far better clubs... Fix this bs please.
description: The sun is shining, it’s time to play the real-time multiplayer game everybody’s talking about!Game of the Year 2018 - Mobile Game AwardsGame of the Year  - TIGA Awards Play on beautiful courses against players around the world in real-time as you compete in tournaments, 1v1 games and challenge your Facebook friends! Upgrade your clubs and unlock tours as you master your golf skills in the quest to be the Golf Clash king!   - Quick-fire 1v1 real-time gameplay.  - Revolutionary shot system that’s easy to learn but difficult to master.  - Thousands of live players online waiting to be challenged.  - Progress through more advanced tours as you “raise the stakes”.  - Earn promotion in weekly leagues to win club card bonuses.  - Compete against your friends via Facebook to earn the bragging rights.  - Unlock chests as you discover and upgrade to premium clubs and balls.  - Save and share replays of your jaw-dropping shots.  - Banter your opponents with chat and emoji during the match!  - Advance through challenging courses and weather conditions.Emoji icons supplied by EmojiOne

comments: I paid to get ad free.....STILL HAVE ADS! I like the game a lot. But if you have a button that gives you the option to pay for NO ADS, then you should get what you PAID for. The game itself is a lot of fun. I enjoy it a lot and its great time killer. But NOT getting what I PAID FOR does not make me a happy customer. This issue needs to be addressed and fixed.

Way too many ads. Every two games you get 30 seconds of advertisment. At one point an ad popped up during my game and made me lose. Played this for 5 minutes and uninstalled, dont even bother to download the game.

I always play games with music in the background and while playing this game my music would be constantly shut off because of the ads, I don't mind the ads themselves, just the fact that it constantly interrupts other sounds playing on the system is very irritating. Gave you 2 stars for a nice game, didn't play a lot though so couldn't tell you more.

This game is fun to play, however, I hate how on every Voodoo app that doesn't require Wi-Fi to play, the only way to stop being bombarded with 5000000000 ads, I have to turn my Wi-Fi and data off, otherwise the game play is ruined. This is a problem that really needs to be addressed. I read the reviews before downloading, so I know it's a consistent problem.  FYI, if you wanna play without all the ads, just turn your data and Wi-Fi off. It's a nuisance, but so are the ads.

Just listen to all of the reviewers and don't download this app! I got about thirty seconds of game-play, then an ad popped up. The ad lasted about a minute, and after that, my phone started glitching out.

Gravity is meant to work like gravity. The "alien" isn't the centre of gravity. It's meant to fall SIDEWAYS not directly AT YOU. I would understand if you were playing as a planet traversing through space, but you're not. This game is ass.

comments: Love the concept of the game but the moment you start reaching higher castle lvl  that's when you realize that if you don't pay you will be on a long journey, ie.. PvP are out of the question everyone has minimum of 5 epic items, arena you will have to settle for 5th or less place due to power lvl difference. I am about 141000 fighting 190000 or 90000, which is not fair for those of low power or advantage to those of high.

Great game. Everything you could want in a game. Castle building, PvP. Unique equipment with special stats. Different attack types, economy classes. Rewards are rewarding enough. So far 5/5. The theme is good. The balance seems reasonable. My only suggestion is making to character limit for name changes bigger for the dwellers/subjects. Only thing I can constructively suggest. Or be able to type first and last name.

After playing for a few hours this I find this game good my only problem is that you need to pay for those epic drops? I mean in a game if you defeated the boss those are supposed to be yours without paying, I can accept paying for 1 dollar but the second boss requires me to purchase it for almost $3 I already paid for premium I don't want to pay for other things. Please make the drops free for premium members or have them cheap or totally free, or else after my premium I'll quit this game.

I loved this game very much, I had a lot of really nice things and invested nearly $60 dollars into making my guys 5 stars and diamonds and other level up promos... I was the clan leader of the "Bananna Kings" my main complaint is my phone rebooted and now I've lost everything... my game, my victories, my clan, and all the money I invested in this great game... please help. ;( my username on my good account is "Skylark"

Loved playing the game, I just wish there was a balance in the PvP Tournaments, can't find a tournament where everyone else isn't 20000 Points over my guys. Please fix this!! Just put a bloody +/-5000 points deviation on it! Make it more enjoyable for people who don't buy everything they see

best game on mobile i think. just make sure your account is linked to your facebook and google play so you dont ever lose your account i almost lost everything when my phone broke. luckly i got it to turn on for a bit before going off and linked my accounts. now im fine..
description: Become the lord and master of a real medieval castle! Accept new subjects, assign them to their duties, train and protect your men and women! Defy your rivals and laws of physics as you build and upgrade your fortress! Your pudgy warriors look great in their shining armor! Nourish and train your troops, and they’ll crush the armies of Grav the Mighty Brainpan, find the shelter of the fearsome OM-NOM, put the Abyss Lord back in his place, and also burn down a couple of enemies’ castles! All day long your scribes scratch their heads with quills, treasurers spill coins on the floor and blacksmiths drop anvils on their feet for the sake of your prosperity! Prepare true specialists, become wealthy and influential! Build a dating room and watch your subjects have children who’ll soon grow up and serve you too! Assume command, my lord! Here are some of the opportunities you get in the game: - Story-driven campaign. In hundreds of missions your heroes fight orcs, giants, skeletons and even dragons! Battle magic, cold steel and cunning strategy – the end justifies the means! - Castle construction. Build new rooms for your stronghold and upgrade the existing ones. You’ve got all you need to create a dream castle! Begin the construction now! - Developing the villagers. Each of your subjects can learn new skills and wear any equipment. Train great warriors and scribes… and then swap them with each other! - Multiplayer. Get medieval! Burn and plunder the castle of someone you don’t like… And you don’t like all of them, right?We are now working on:- Clans: Join an exciting cooperative gameplay! Create clans together with other players, talk in chat, develop you kingdoms, train your champions, conquer territories and dominate other kingdoms.- Portals and mazes: even more options to earn unique chests with precious rewards. New enemies, new bosses and new territories!- Caravans: if you are tired of war, go into business!- The extension of the storyline campaign: get to the chief villain and triumph over the universal evil!- Collections and unique heroes- Daily log-in bonuses- The improvement of the visual elements of the game- The optimization and balance of the game process- Performance improvementsAll of these and many other innovations are waiting for you in the upcoming updates!
descriptionHTML:
Become the lord and master of a real medieval castle! Accept new subjects, assign them to their duties, train and protect your men and women! Defy your rivals and laws of physics as you build and upgrade your fortress!

Your pudgy warriors look great in their shining armor! Nourish and train your troops, and they’ll crush the armies of Grav the Mighty Brainpan, find the shelter of the fearsome OM-NOM, put the Abyss Lord back in his place, and also burn down a couple of enemies’ castles!

All day long your scribes scratch their heads with quills, treasurers spill coins on the floor and blacksmiths drop anvils on their feet for the sake of your prosperity! Prepare true specialists, become wealthy and influential! Build a dating room and watch your subjects have children who’ll soon grow up and serve you too!


Assume command, my lord! Here are some of the opportunities you get in the game:

- Story-driven campaign. In hundreds of missions your heroes fight orcs, giants, skeletons and even dragons! Battle magic, cold steel and cunning strategy – the end justifies the means!
- Castle construction. Build new rooms for your stronghold and upgrade the existing ones. You’ve got all you need to create a dream castle! Begin the construction now!
- Developing the villagers. Each of your subjects can learn new skills and wear any equipment. Train great warriors and scribes… and then swap them with each other!
- Multiplayer. Get medieval! Burn and plunder the castle of someone you don’t like… And you don’t like all of them, right?

We are now working on:
- Clans: Join an exciting cooperative gameplay! Create clans together with other players, talk in chat, develop you kingdoms, train your champions, conquer territories and dominate other kingdoms.
- Portals and mazes: even more options to earn unique chests with precious rewards. New enemies, new bosses and new territories!
- Caravans: if you are tired of war, go into business!
- The extension of the storyline campaign: get to the chief villain and triumph over the universal evil!
- Collections and unique heroes
- Daily log-in bonuses
- The improvement of the visual elements of the game
- The optimization and balance of the game process
- Performance improvements
All of these and many other innovations are waiting for you in the upcoming updates!
developerAddress: Barbara Strozzilaan 201, 1083 HN in Amsterdam
recentChanges: - We are preparing Hustle Castle for a number of major updates that will include: Clan Battles, Item Enchantment, Co-op Battles, and some other new features.

- Expanded statistics at the end of a battle
- Ability to show items in the in-game chat

title: Hustle Castle: Fantasy Kingdom

comments: I've liked this game for years. Some adjustments needed: realistically if gas goes empty and you're still coasting or you're in the air you should be able to coast until the vehicle completely stops or lands before the game stops. You've had the nitros in now which is great. However, you still haven't fixed the previous issue. IF I CAN COAST OR NITRO BOOST MYSELF TO A GAS CAN THAT'S LOGICAL. However, you stop the game before the vehicle stops moving which is in a sense, removing logic, and the law of motion!

The best racing game ever, I've played this game along time ago. the first version it has 4/5 cars it was so fuuun.That was 5 years ago now I want to play it again.I feel the nostalgia ooohh the good old days.Now I'm going to install the game.U guys change my life Thank u guys soo much guys. I hope my tears will help u guys. :)

Maybe some new vehicles? Taxi. Limo. Tow truck. Hearse.... maybe some new stages too? Under water. Race track. Bridges. Derby. Graveyard.  I originally posted this way back in 2015 and yet you said you are constantly improving the game??? We try and give you the developer new ideas but it seems that no one bothers to read our comments? I guess it's just a lack of interest. Hopefully this time someone will read it............

For this game to be so simple compared to todays games and grafics, I love it. I spend hours sometimes playing this.  Not to mention they keep upgrading and making it beter and better, keep it up fellas....i havent experienced any of the problems mentioned withthe updates others have but until then great game
Best game ever. I play it all the time even at work but people look at me stupid because im trying to keep from dying and tilting my phone like a moron.. Please make my efforts not be in vain!

Its a very good game without any tension of wining any difficult task...I like it very much and its not much addicting I have played many games but its very different. controls are also good but this game needs some practice . I am enjoying this game because the tasks are not very difficult but at the same time not very easy its a perfect game and the main character of the game is very funny he always sleeps in the vehicle.....so finally.... I like this game very much
description: One of the most addictive and entertaining physics based driving games ever made! And it's free!Meet Newton Bill, the young aspiring uphill racer. He is about to embark on a journey that takes him to where no ride has ever been before. From Ragnarok to a Nuclear Plant, all places are a racing track to Bill. With little respect to the laws of physics, Bill will not rest until he has conquered the highest hills up on the moon! Face the challenges of unique hill climbing environments with many different cars. Gain bonuses from daring tricks and collect coins to upgrade your car and reach even higher distances. Watch out though - Bill's stout neck is not what it used to be when he was a kid! And his good old gasoline crematorium will easily run out of fuel.Features: - Lots of different vehicles with unique upgrades (many different vehicles: bike, truck, jeep, tank, etc.) - Tuneable parts include engine, suspension, tires and 4WD - Numerous stages with levels to reach in each (Countryside, Desert, Arctic and the Moon! +++) - Share your score with a screenshot with your friends! - Cool graphics and smooth physics simulation - Designed to look good on low resolution and high resolution devices (incl. tablets) - Real turbo sound when you upgrade your engine! - Garage mode: build and drive your dream vehicle with custom parts! - Get new boosters to drive even further - 27+ Levels! - 28+ Vehicles!Vehicles: jeep, motocross bike, monster truck, tractor, hippie van, onewheeler, quad bike, tourist bus, race car, police car, ambulance, fire truck, snow mobile, super offroad, and many more! Hill Climb Racing is free to play but there are optional in-app purchases available.Remember that we're always reading your feedback and are hard at work creating new vehicles, levels, features and of course fixing any issues you may find. So we'd really appreciate if you'd report what you like or dislike and any issues you may have with the game to support@fingersoft.net and please include your device make and model.Follow Us:* Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Fingersoft* Twitter: @fingersoft* Web: https://www.fingersoft.net* Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/hillclimbracing_officialTerms of Use: http://fingersoft.net/eulaPrivacy Policy: http://fingersoft.net/privacyHill Climb Racing is a registered trademark of Fingersoft Ltd. All rights reserved.

comments: I originally gave a 4 star buy now I am dropping the stars to 1. I have the cloud backup and after 1 day of playing everything was erased and I loss all my progress. Why have a cloud save or play the game or spend moo pney when it's erased. I still love the game but now frustrated I will think about uninstalling.

The puzzles are interesting, the animations are generally enjoyable. It quickly becomes a grind, though, where you aren't enjoying the gameplay, you're just trying to get past the timewasters of the daily challenge, or fighting the arbitrary points of the arena. The clan battles and Mighty Eagle challenge are the best parts, but you can't play them all the time. You have to grind away in the Arena.

I just purchased a new phone. And being I'm using the same e-mail address i would have thought it would have started me at the same level I had been on prior to the new phone. Kinda sucks because i had spent a near fortune and was at level 64 ! Unless they can fix this I will remove the game for good. I mean I had every hat except the ones that cost 25,000. Now I'm at zero!

RESUBMITTED: Arena games were sucked up by those high-card players or maybe cheaters. My power cards are the same, just like my opponent, or higher than my opponent's cards. When I slinging those piggies or blocks, it gives me lower points like 4 hundred thousand. But if my opponent slinging them all, it gives higher points like 7.5 million. I lost my winning streaks so I had to play again but it gives me same points so I lost again, sadly. I thought your arena games are really much fun, but they're not.

GAH! They've over complicated this game with unnecessary graphics and gifts and prizes etc. I couldn't even figure out how to get into the levels for a while haha. I'm sure if I had the patience to go through and understand it properly it would be fine, but I didn't want to. Old angry birds setup was better. Wish you didn't change it. Uninstalled after 1 day.

Classic gameply bogged down by aggravating fremium distration. Havent run into any energy bars yet and already on second world. New birds add interesting gameplay elements but spells are an automatic win that add no semse of achievement besides skipping a hard level. If you want some classic angry birds but dont mind clicking through to get to it then give this a download.
description: Join hundreds of millions of players for FREE and start your Angry Birds slingshot adventure now! Team up with your friends, gather in clans and take on challenges and events in the all new game modes. Are you ready to evolve your birds and show your skills in the most daring Angry Birds game out there?CHOOSE YOUR BIRD!It’s the ultimate slingshot strategy – YOU choose which bird to fling next! “But that makes it easier, right?” WRONG! You’ll need to choose wisely if you’re going to stop those eggs from getting scrambled. Plus, destroy blocks to fill up the Destruct-O-Meter and earn extra birds!NEW MULTI-STAGE LEVELS!You’ve never seen Piggy Island like this – jaw-droppingly stunning levels brimming with exotic plants, quirky details and plenty of peril. And because those naughty porkies are building their teetering towers right under your beak, many levels have multiple stages. Uh oh.SPECTACULAR SPELLS!Blizzards, Hot Chilis, Golden Ducks and other outrageous spells give you an added advantage against those swindling swine. And when you need some serious help, guess who’s at hand to make a pork-smashing cameo? That’s right, it’s the sardine loving Mighty Eagle. Oh yeah!CHALLENGE OTHER PLAYERS!Challenge players from across the world in the Arena to see who’s the most hardcore bird flinger of them all. Play new tournaments every day, earn feathers to level up your birds and face off against the toughest competition on the planet. Game face!DEFEAT BOSS PIGGIES!There’s some serious bad guys on Piggy Island, and your slingshot skills are needed to take them down. Foreman Pig, Chef Pig and the infamous King Pig will stop at nothing to keep your eggs. Are you gonna let ‘em get away with that? It’s time to teach the pork a lesson.-----------------------------Discover:https://www.angrybirds.com/Follow:https://www.facebook.com/angrybirdshttps://twitter.com/AngryBirds-----------------------------Angry Birds 2 is completely free to play, but there are optional in-app purchases available. Either way, get ready to rain destruction on those swindling swine!This game may include:- Direct links to social networking websites that are intended for an audience over the age of 13.- Direct links to the internet that can take players away from the game with the potential to browse to any web page- Advertising of Rovio products and also products from third partiesThis game may require internet connectivity and subsequent data transfer charges may apply. When the game is played for the first time, there is a one-off download of additional content.Terms of Use: http://www.rovio.com/eulaPrivacy Policy: http://www.rovio.com/privacy
